Text:
Read description. All audios are separate.
"Audio Tracks are all demuxed, so download the ones you want.
Use MPC (    http://cccp-project.net/ ) to automatically recognize & play the external Audio tracks or mux the Audio
 in MKV with  mkvmerge (     http://www.videohelp.com/tools/MKVtoolnix ) if you wish to use other player."

If you only download the movie + English you download 2 GB only.
